Plot: A 15-year-old girl in a black gang in Brussels must choose between loyalty and love when she falls for a Moroccan boy from a rival gang. The city of Brussels, plagued by high rates of youth...
Title: Black
Writer: Adil El Arbi, Bilall Fallah, Hans Herbots, Nele Meirhaeghe
Actors: Sanâa Alaoui, Martha Canga Antonio, Aboubakr Bensaihi, Sanaa Bourrasse
